title: A Doctor’s Order of 30 Cat Memes Fur That Mood-Boosting Effect on Your Feline-Shaped Heart
description: Unfortunately, feline fam, we woke up today feline a little under the weather. And it's not just allergies (which have also been plaguing us nonstop since Spring decided it was time to release every single pollen into the air all at once), we have a pain in our feline-shaped hearts that just won't go away. So, naturally, we went to the doctor to get it checked out. You know what they said to us? The answer to our problems is purrfectly simple - and they purrscribed us 30 cat memes to make us feel better.You see, cat memes have this meowgic about them to cure the ailments of any feline-lover with just a few simple memes. We're not one to question doctors, so we went straight to the pharmacy (I Can Has Cheezburger) and filled ourselves with hissterical feline funnies, and guess what? We're feeling better already. So even if the Meownday blues got you down, don't worry, there are always cat memes to boost your mood and make sure you're feline fine. Enjoy!
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: A Doctor’s Order of 30 Cat Memes Fur That Mood-Boosting Effect on Your Feline-Shaped Heart - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Unfortunately, feline fam, we woke up today feline a little under the weather. And it's not just allergies (which have also been plaguing us nonstop since Spring decided it was time to release every single pollen into the air all at once), we have a pain in our feline-shaped hearts that just won't go away. So, naturally, we went to the doctor to get it checked out. You know what they said to us? The answer to our problems is purrfectly simple - and they purrscribed us 30 cat memes to make us feel better.

You see, cat memes have this meowgic about them to cure the ailments of any feline-lover with just a few simple memes. We're not one to question doctors, so we went straight to the pharmacy (I Can Has Cheezburger) and filled ourselves with hissterical feline funnies, and guess what? We're feeling better already. So even if the Meownday blues got you down, don't worry, there are always cat memes to boost your mood and make sure you're feline fine. Enjoy!
